definition: liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: Conclusion This method could be used to determination of matrine in Radix sophora flavescens.
sentences.chinese: 结论此方法适用于测定苦参中苦参碱的含量。

sentences.english: Conclusion This method could be used to determination of matrine in Radix sophora flavescens.
sentences.chinese: 结论此方法适用于测定苦参中苦参碱的含量。

sentences.english: In the review we summarize the research progress of matrine in the anti tumor mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 本文总结了近年来苦参碱在抗肿瘤研究中的最新进展。

sentences.english: Aim To observe the therapeutic efficacy of Matrine on viral keratitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察苦参碱对病毒性角膜炎的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare marine sustained-release pellets and study its release characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备苦参素缓释微丸，并研究其体外释药性能。

sentences.english: Matrine is one of natural plant pesticides with high value application.
sentences.chinese: 苦参碱是极具有开发应用价值的天然植物杀虫剂。

sentences.english: Rootstocks and roots of Kushen coexist in commercial drug, and the rootstocks are already the main source.
sentences.chinese: 商品苦参根与根茎并存，根茎已是主要来源。

sentences.english: Conclusion This study would offer foundation of developing orally preparation of Matrine.
sentences.chinese: 结论本研究为开发苦参碱的口服剂型提供依据。

sentences.english: Conclusion The oxymatrine has the strong anti-HBV virus function.
sentences.chinese: 结论苦参素具有较强抗乙肝病毒作用。

sentences.english: Sophorcarpidine is both the effective composition and the toxical composition of Sophorae Tonkinensis Radix et Rhizoma.
sentences.chinese: 其中苦参碱既是山豆根的功效成分也是毒性成分。

sentences.english: Aim To study the bioequivalence of oxymatrine dispersible tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察苦参素分散片生物等效性。

sentences.english: The results indicate that an appropriate concentration of SF has a selective antileukemic effect.
sentences.chinese: 提示苦参在一定浓度范围内有选择性抗白血病效应。

sentences.english: Objective Observe the clinical curative effect of kurarinone and placenta peptide on chronic hepatitis II.
sentences.chinese: 观察苦参素联合胎盘肽治疗慢性乙型肝炎的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Study on Relation between Collecting Stages and Alkaloid Content of Sophora flavescens Ait.
sentences.chinese: 苦参采收期与生物碱含量关系的研究。

sentences.english: Aim To determine total matrine concentration by exploring bromocresol green method.
sentences.chinese: 目的采用溴甲酚绿法测定苦参总碱。

sentences.english: The Anti-Tumor Activity on Alkaloid of Sophora Favescens Ait.
sentences.chinese: 苦参类生物碱抗肿瘤作用。
